repnme.cdata!:
Kyrgyz Republic - Second Fast Track
            Initiative Catalytic Grant Fund Project : restructuring

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Second Fast Track
            Initiative Catalytic Grant Fund Project for the Kyrgyz
            Republic is to support the Government's introduction of
            the national school preparation program for a smooth
            transition to school for children between the ages of five
            (5) and six (6) years. The closing date for the project will
            be extended from August 31, 2012 until December 31, 2012.
            This will be the first extension of the Project. The Project
            is on track towards completion and implementation
            performance has been satisfactory. Key performance
            indicators have been met - 3,200 primary school teachers and
            69 methodologists have been trained in pedagogical practice;
            schools in four oblasts were provided furniture; and a
            standard package of teaching materials was distributed to
            2,135 schools enabling them to open at least one preschool
            class to the communities they serve.  At the same time, due
            to successful procurement processes, the Project has
            accumulated a savings of USD 250,000 which will be used for
            the purchase of additional learning materials should this
            extension is approved.

display_title.display_title:
Kyrgyz Republic - Second Fast
            Track Initiative Catalytic Grant Fund Project :
            restructuring  : Main report
